snippet: MAXMAN--Bobbi, passed away suddenly on July 7th after 83 wonderful years. Beloved husband of the late Al; father of Joel (Sherri) and Ron (Helen); grandfather of Andrew, Elizabeth, Nicole, Sophie and Julia. Lived life to the fullest. Dedicated tea...
lead_paragraph: MAXMAN--Bobbi, passed away suddenly on July 7th after 83 wonderful years. Beloved husband of the late Al; father of Joel (Sherri) and Ron (Helen); grandfather of Andrew, Elizabeth, Nicole, Sophie and Julia. Lived life to the fullest. Dedicated teacher and life-long learner. Theater and bridge devotee. She will be deeply missed. Services Sunday 11:00am; Plaza Jewish Chapel, 630 Amsterdam Avenue. 1/3
